name: Firefox OSX Mac Bookmark Folder Icons
description: Replaces the old folder and smart folder icons with updated El Capitan icons. Works on OS X, Windows and GNU/Linux
css:
@namespace url(http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul);

/* Normal Folder Icon*/
.bookmark-item[container]:not([query="true"]){
list-style-image: url('data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABAAAAAQCAYAAAAf8/9hAAAAAXNSR0IB2cksfwAA\

ZXNjcmlwdGlvbiByZGY6YWJvdXQ9IiIKICAgICAgICAgICAgeG1sbnM6dGlmZj0i\
